verses.kjv: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king’s son.
verses.ct: God, grant the king your justice, and give your righteousness to the king's son.

verses.kjv: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.
verses.ct: May he govern your people with righteousness and defend your poor with fair judgment.

verses.kjv: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.
verses.ct: Let the mountains bring peace to the people, and the hills bring righteousness.

verses.kjv: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.
verses.ct: May he defend the poor among the people, rescue the children of those in need, and crush the oppressor.

verses.kjv: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.
verses.ct: May they deeply revere you as long as the sun and moon exist, through every generation.

verses.kjv: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.
verses.ct: May he be like rain falling on freshly cut grass, like showers soaking the earth.

verses.kjv: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
verses.ct: During his reign, may the righteous thrive, and may peace overflow as long as the moon remains.

verses.kjv: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.
verses.ct: May he rule from sea to sea, and from the river to the ends of the earth.

verses.kjv: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.
verses.ct: Desert dwellers will kneel before him, and his enemies will grovel in the dirt.

verses.kjv: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.
verses.ct: The kings of Tarshish and the coastlands will bring tribute; the kings of Sheba and Seba will present gifts.

verses.kjv: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.
verses.ct: Every king will bow down before him; every nation will serve him.

verses.kjv: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.
verses.ct: Because he will rescue the needy when they cry out — the poor and those who have no one to help them.

verses.kjv: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.
verses.ct: He will have compassion on the poor and needy, and he will save the souls of those in need.

verses.kjv: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.
verses.ct: He will redeem their souls from fraud and violence, for their blood is precious in his sight.

verses.kjv: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.
verses.ct: May he live long! May gold from Sheba be given to him. May people pray for him constantly and praise him every day.

verses.kjv: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.
verses.ct: May there be abundant grain in the land, even on the mountaintops; may its fruit sway like the trees of Lebanon, and may people in the cities flourish like grass across the earth.

verses.kjv: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.
verses.ct: May his name last forever, continuing as long as the sun shines. May all peoples be blessed through him, and may every nation call him blessed.

verses.kjv: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD God, the God of Israel, who alone does wonderful things.

verses.kjv: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.
verses.ct: Praise his glorious name forever! May the whole earth be filled with his glory. Amen and amen!

verses.kjv: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
verses.ct: This concludes the prayers of David, the son of Jesse.
